verbs.description: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - Un [V: have] agreed to return the remains of American servicemen who fought in the Korean War to the U.S. as part of their historic Singapore accord .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - Un] have [V: agreed] [ARG1: to return the remains of American servicemen who fought in the Korean War to the U.S. as part of their historic Singapore accord] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - Un] have agreed to [V: return] [ARG1: the remains of American servicemen who fought in the Korean War] [ARG2: to the U.S.] [ARGM-ADV: as part of their historic Singapore accord] .

President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong - Un have agreed to return the remains of [ARG0: American servicemen] [R-ARG0: who] [V: fought] [ARGM-LOC: in the Korean War] [ARG2: to the U.S.] as part of their historic Singapore accord .
